antispoof-desc: Gu'uri la yu'ura n ka ba'am niɛ gee ŋwɔna taaba
antispoof-conflict-top: Tuntuna yu'urɛ "$1" ba'am ŋwuna la sɛba n tagelɛ wa {{PLURAL:$2|tuntuna yu'urɛ/ tuntuneba yura}}
antispoof-conflict-bottom: N beleni mɛ malum loe tuntuna yu'urɛ
antispoof-name-illegal:
Fu San bɔta ti fu gu tulesi, tuntuna yu'urɛ "$1" kan ta'am tum: $2.
N beleni mɛ malum loe tuntuna yu'urɛ
antispoof-badtype: Tuntuna yu'urɛ la ti ba bo la ka de la sɛka n ka de tuntɔɔ la taaba.
antispoof-prohibited: Tuntuna yu'urɛ kan ta'am tara "$1" se'ere zuo n sɔi la, la kisimɛ.
antispoof-combining: Tuntuna yu'urɛ kan ta'am lagum tara yele-ana "$1".
antispoof-unassigned: Tuntuna yu'urɛ kan ta'am tara "$1" se'ere zuo n sɔi la, ba ka mi a yele.
antispoof-deprecated: Tuntuna yu'urɛ kan ta'am tara "$1" se'ere zuo n sɔi la, a de la sɛla ti ba nam a yele.
antispoof-noletters: Tuntuna yu'urɛ nari ti a tara la anŋa bii ansi.
antispoof-mixedscripts: Tuntuna yu'urɛ kan ta'am tara anŋa ze'ele gulegɔ zo'e zo'e sɔ puan.
antispoof-tooshort: Fu tuntuna yu'urɛ la ti fu bɔ' la ba'am ana la girega.
antispoof-ignore-help: Bo'orɔ tuntuneba yɔ'ɔ ti ba maala yu'urɛ hali di sãn pugum ŋwɔna la yuse'ere n diŋɛ bɔna bini.
